Detailed Description

Request that the various request that return search matches should inherit from.

Member Function Documentation

virtual const vector<VanillaMatch*>& SearchResultRequest::getMatches (   )  const [pure virtual]
 

Returns a vector containing the vanilla matches.

Will be unusable when the request is deleted. If they are to be used after the request is deleted, then they must be cloned since they can point into data owned by the request.

Implemented in ClosestSearchRequest, ExpandRequest, ExternalSearchRequest, ProximityRequest, SearchRequest, and EmptySearchRequest.

Referenced by getTotalNbrMatches(), and translateMatchIdx().

virtual uint32 SearchResultRequest::getNbrOverviewMatches (   )  const [inline, virtual]
 

Returns the number of overview matches found.

Default is zero.

Reimplemented in ExternalSearchRequest, and SearchRequest.
